mapper.select: SELECT C.COURSE_NAME, P.PROFESSOR_NAME, C.COURSE_CODE FROM MY_COURSE M JOIN COURSE C ON M.COURSE_CODE = C.COURSE_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR P ON P.PROFESSOR_ID = C.PROFESSOR_ID WHERE M.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId}

SELECT C.COURSE_NAME, C.COURSE_SORTATION, C.COURSE_CODE, D.DEPART_NAME, P.PROFESSOR_NAME, C.COURSE_CREDIT, P.PROFESSOR_EMAIL, C.COURSE_SUMMARY FROM COURSE C JOIN PROFESSOR P ON P.PROFESSOR_ID = C.PROFESSOR_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPART_CODE = P.DEPART_CODE WHERE C.COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode}
SELECT WEEK_NUM, WEEK_CONTENT FROM COURSE_WEEKLY WHERE COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode}
select sum(semester_credit2) from s_g_vu where student_id = 22000001
